MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.30pm to cut trees near to overhead line equipment in the Winchester area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.23pm on 25th January 2021.
